Text:
Thanks Nepotu. Just a quick question, how does a western conference meet eastern conference in a non finals game? Just wondering!

Again thanks, i've been away for awhile but now back. Good to see you still have playoff caliber games to share!

In 1979 were 10 teams in EC and 10 teams in WC. San Antonio Spurs in 1979 was in EC.
Glad to see you back. I haven't forgot my old friends with vintage wishes. :) Cheers, bro!
People, don't be selfish and give something back to this community by seeding! This rare things can't survive by themselves.
